ygData.subject: Re: BUG/FEEDBACK
ygData.msgSnippet: A friend of mine once spoke to a GM about implemented this, and he was told by this GM that the code is already implemented.  They don t have to write anything
ygData.messageBody:
A friend of mine once spoke to a GM about implemented this, and he was told
by this GM that the code is already implemented. They don't have to write
anything new, they just have to activate it.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: mprez20@... <mprez20@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, April 30, 1999 4:28 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: BUG/FEEDBACK


>From: mprez20@...
>
>On the contrary I was told that it was VERY hard to make buildings off
>limits. To implement that code for every creatures AI would have been a
>large task and due to time constraints was not implemented
